IPSActiveSubstances

Intensional definitionConsider: ISO 11238 Health informatics -- Identification of medicinal products -- Data elements and structures for the unique identification and exchange of regulated information on substances

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410942007 (Drug or medicament (substance))
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    410942007Drug or medicament
